CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBehave
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 유닛의 단순 움직임
if self.ParentAI.time >= self.ParentAI.tick then self.ParentAI.time = 0
local UnitEntity = self.ParentAI.Entity local Position = UnitEntity.TransformComponent.Position local Destination = self.ParentAI.Destination local CurrentState = UnitEntity.StateComponent.CurrentStateName local FlipX = UnitEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX local Range = UnitEntity.UnitAIComponent.Range
--[[ if Destination.x - Range < Position.x and Destination.x + Range < Position.x then UnitEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE") UnitEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = false UnitEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(-1, 0), 1) --log("left") elseif Destination.x - Range > Position.x and Destination.x + Range > Position.x then UnitEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE") UnitEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = true UnitEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(1, 0), 1) --log("right") elseif Destination.x - Range < Position.x and Destination.x + Range > Position.x and CurrentState ~= "STAND" then UnitEntity.UnitAIComponent.Source = Vector2(Position.x, Position.y) UnitEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("STAND") UnitEntity.MovementComponent:Stop() --log("stop") end ]]
if Position.x > Destination.x + Range then UnitEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE") UnitEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = false UnitEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(-1, 0), 1) --log("left") elseif Position.x < Destination.x - Range then UnitEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE") UnitEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = true UnitEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(1, 0), 1) --log("right") elseif Destination.x - Range < Position.x and Destination.x + Range > Position.x and CurrentState ~= "IDLE" then UnitEntity.UnitAIComponent.Source = Vector2(Position.x, Position.y) UnitEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("IDLE") UnitEntity.MovementComponent:Stop() --log("stop") end end
return BehaviourTreeStatus.Success
